1.name: Moonlit Arrows
1.description: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.25 seconds.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.25 seconds.

1.name: Celestial Attunement
1.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.
1.longDescription: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.

1.name: Kaldorei Resistance
1.description: Light of Elune grants the target 15 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.
1.longDescription: Light of Elune grants the target 15 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.

4.name: Ranger
4.description: Activate to make the next Sentinel pierce through all Heroes hit.Passive: Sentinel's width is increased by 25% and deals up to 150% more damage based on distance traveled.
4.longDescription: Activate to make the next Sentinel pierce through all Heroes hit.Passive: Sentinel's width is increased by 25% and deals up to 150% more damage based on distance traveled.

4.name: Lunar Blaze
4.description: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 50%.Quest: Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 100%.
4.longDescription: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 50%.Quest: Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 100%.

4.name: Trueshot Aura
4.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark and grant 20% increased Basic Attack damage to nearby allied Heroes for 5 seconds.Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 20%.
4.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark and grant 20% increased Basic Attack damage to nearby allied Heroes for 5 seconds.Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 20%.

7.name: Everlasting Light
7.description: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 40% more.
7.longDescription: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 40% more.

7.name: Mark of Mending
7.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.
7.longDescription: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Elune's Chosen
7.description: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal the target ally for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal the target ally for 200% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 10 seconds.

10.name: Shadowstalk
10.description: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 416 Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.
10.longDescription: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 416 Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

10.name: Starfall
10.description: Deal 92 damage per second and Slow enemies by 20.0% in an area. Lasts 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 92 damage per second and Slow enemies by 20.0% in an area. Lasts 5 seconds.

13.name: Quickening Blessing
13.description: Gain 10% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 10% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Harsh Moonlight
13.description: Sentinel Slows the first target hit by 40% and reduces their damage dealt by 40% for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Sentinel Slows the first target hit by 40% and reduces their damage dealt by 40% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Ranger's Mark
13.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets increase the duration of Hunter's Mark by 0.50 seconds.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets increase the duration of Hunter's Mark by 0.50 seconds.

16.name: Empower
16.description: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. The first Hero hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. The first Hero hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Huntress' Fury
16.description: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemies.
16.longDescription: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemies.

16.name: Darnassian Archery
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 10% increased Attack Damage bonus for 8 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 10% increased Attack Damage bonus for 8 seconds. This bonus is lost when Basic Attacking non-Heroes.

20.name: Eyes of the Huntress
20.description: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 2 seconds and heals allies below 50% Health for 50% more.
20.longDescription: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 2 seconds and heals allies below 50% Health for 50% more.

20.name: Celestial Wrath
20.description: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.
20.longDescription: Starfall applies Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.

20.name: Shooting Star
20.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.0. Every 8th Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.
20.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.0. Every 8th Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.

20.name: Iceblade Arrows
20.description: Increase Attack Speed by 25%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
20.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 25%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

1.name: Greed
1.description: Increase the time Minions will grant Annihilation from 1.5 to 3 seconds. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, Globe of Annihilation's range is increased by 33% and it deals 20% more damage to non-Heroic targets.
1.longDescription: Increase the time Minions will grant Annihilation from 1.5 to 3 seconds. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, Globe of Annihilation's range is increased by 33% and it deals 20% more damage to non-Heroic targets.

1.name: Gluttony
1.description: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.
1.longDescription: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3. Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

1.name: Wrath
1.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by 75% the amount of Annihilation he has.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by 75% the amount of Annihilation he has.

4.name: Army of Hell
4.description: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.

4.name: Hellforged Armor
4.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25 Armor and last 4 seconds longer.
4.longDescription: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25 Armor and last 4 seconds longer.

4.name: Battleborn
4.description: Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Art of Chaos
7.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 30 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.
7.longDescription: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 30 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.

7.name: Bombardment
7.description: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 3 seconds have an additional 2.00 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.
7.longDescription: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 3 seconds have an additional 2.00 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.

7.description: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 2 Annihilation per Hero hit.
7.longDescription: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 2 Annihilation per Hero hit.

10.name: Demonic Invasion
10.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 68 damage per impact. Grunts deal 44 damage, have 780 health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 101 damage to nearby enemies.
10.longDescription: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 68 damage per impact. Grunts deal 44 damage, have 780 health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 101 damage to nearby enemies.

10.name: Tide of Sin
10.description: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.
10.longDescription: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.

13.name: Brutish Vanguard
13.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.
13.longDescription: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.

13.name: Cydaea's Kiss
13.description: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.

13.description: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.
13.longDescription: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.

16.description: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Hell Rift
16.description: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds.

16.name: Sin's Grasp
16.description: Increases the range of All Shall Burn by 20%. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.
16.longDescription: Increases the range of All Shall Burn by 20%. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

20.name: Siegebreaker
20.description: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.
20.longDescription: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.

20.name: Black Pool
20.description: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 Armor per second, up to 15, and take 58 damage per second.
20.longDescription: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 Armor per second, up to 15, and take 58 damage per second.

20.name: Pride

20.longDescription: After gaining 400 Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 15% and it deals 125 additional damage.

20.name: Trample
20.description: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 250 damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1.00 second.
20.longDescription: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 250 damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1.00 second.

1.name: Extra TNT
1.description: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.
1.longDescription: Increases Xplodium Charge damage by 10% per target hit, up to 100%.

1.description: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.
1.longDescription: Increases the Mana restored from Scrap by 100%.

4.longDescription: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds.  If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

4.longDescription: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

4.longDescription: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Gazlowe deal 50% more damage. Rock-it! Turrets gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing their damage taken by 50%.

7.longDescription: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 60% damage.

7.longDescription: Rock-It! Turret attacks slow enemies by 20% for 2 seconds.

7.longDescription: The mana cost of Deth Lazor is reduced by 30 and it charges twice as fast.

10.name: Robo-Goblin
10.description: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.
10.longDescription: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

10.longDescription: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 261 damage.

13.longDescription: Deth Lazor Slows Heroes by 50.00% and Stuns non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

13.description: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.
13.longDescription: Deth Lazor can be charged for 1 additional second to increase its damage bonus by an additional 100%.

13.name: X-Tra Large Bombs
13.description: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by 30%. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet.This effect has a 10 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: Increases Xplodium Charge radius by 30%. Being stunned or rooted causes an Xplodium Charge to drop at Gazlowe's feet.This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

16.longDescription: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

16.longDescription: Xplodium Charge gains a second charge.

20.name: Mecha-Lord

20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal an additional 100.00% damage.Passive: Gain 25 Armor.

20.longDescription: Increases Grav-O-Bomb radius by 25% and damage by 50%.

20.longDescription: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 142 damage.

20.longDescription: Activate to create 5 Scrap around Gazlowe over 5 seconds.

1.name: Easy Prey

1.longDescription: Increases Misha's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

1.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

1.name: Flare
1.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.
1.longDescription: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

4.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.

4.name: Hunter-Gatherer

4.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 10 Armor.

4.longDescription: Every 7 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

4.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

7.name: Aspect of the Beast

7.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1.25 seconds.

7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3 seconds.

7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

10.name: Bestial Wrath

10.longDescription: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

10.longDescription: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 114 damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Wildfire Bear
13.description: Misha deals 29 damage per second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Misha deals 29 damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Aspect of the Hawk
13.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.
13.longDescription: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

13.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 40%, stacking up to a 400% bonus.

16.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Primal Intimidation

16.longDescription: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.50 seconds.Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.50 seconds.

16.name: Feign Death
16.description: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.
16.longDescription: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

20.name: Spirit Bond
20.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

20.name: Kill Command
20.description: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.50 seconds.
20.longDescription: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.50 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor

20.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Hardened Skin
20.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.
20.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

1.name: Free Drinks

1.longDescription: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target (prioritizing Heroes).

1.description: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 100% and increase Mana regeneration by 100% while Fast Feet is active.

4.longDescription: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.600 seconds every time it attacks a Hero.

4.longDescription: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

4.longDescription: Activate to gain Fast Feet for 3 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active.Passive: Increase the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet to 15.00%.

7.longDescription: Healing Brew heals for an additional 44 over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

7.longDescription: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 50% damage and healing.

7.longDescription: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 146 and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.Cannot be used on Li Li.

10.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 73 Health and increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50.

10.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 187 damage to enemies hit.
10.longDescription: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 187 damage to enemies hit.

10.name: Valkyrie
10.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 234 damage and Stunning them for 0.50 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.
10.longDescription: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 234 damage and Stunning them for 0.50 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

13.name: Grounding Bolt
13.description: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.50 seconds.
13.longDescription: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.50 seconds.

13.name: Thundergod's Vigor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1.00 second.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1.00 second.

13.name: Lunging Strike
13.description: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.50 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Fend's range and area by 20%, and its duration by 0.50 seconds.

16.name: Pierce
16.description: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.
16.longDescription: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

16.name: Penetrate
16.description: Enemies take 3.0% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.
16.longDescription: Enemies take 3.0% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

16.name: Martial Law
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3.0% of the Hero's maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3.0% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Infinite Lightning
20.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.
20.longDescription: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

20.name: Imprisoning Light
20.description: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 208 damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 208 damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titan's Revenge
20.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.0.
20.longDescription: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.0.

1.name: Echo Pulse
1.description: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.
1.longDescription: Disruption Pulse now returns to Probius 1.25 seconds after reaching its target, dealing 75% damage on the return trip.

1.name: Warp Resonance
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Warp Rift explosions. Reward: After hitting 10 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, increase the explosion damage by 100. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes with Warp Rift explosions, Warp Rift gains 1 additional charge.

1.name: Gather Minerals
1.description: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560.  Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.
1.longDescription: Quest: Enemy Heroes and Minions drop Minerals when killed. Collect them to increase the Health of Photon Cannons by 8, up to 560.  Reward: After collecting 70 Minerals, Photon Cannons deal 35% more damage, can see over obstacles, and reveal nearby Cloaked units.

4.name: Photon Barrier
4.description: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.
4.longDescription: While a Photon Cannon is alive and powered, Probius gains 30 Spell Armor.

4.name: Turbo Charged
4.description: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Worker Rush grants an additional 10% passive Movement Speed while in a Power Field, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

4.name: Shield Capacitor
4.description: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.
4.longDescription: Probius gains permanent Shields equal to 10% of his max Health. Shields regenerate quickly as long as he hasn't taken damage recently.

7.name: Particle Accelerator
7.description: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.
7.longDescription: Disruption Pulse deals 10% more damage for each enemy or Warp Rift hit, up to 50%.

7.name: Rift Shock
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Warp Rift explosion increases Probius's damage against them by 20% for 10 seconds.

7.name: Tower Defense
7.description: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.
7.longDescription: When Photon Cannon damages an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Pylon Overcharge
10.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 100 damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.
10.longDescription: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 100 damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

10.name: Null Gate
10.description: Vector TargetingProject a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 71 damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.
10.longDescription: Vector TargetingProject a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 71 damage per second and are slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

13.name: Aggressive Matrix
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

13.name: Power Overflowing
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2.0 Mana per second.
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2.0 Mana per second.

13.name: Shield Battery
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 29 Shields per second, up to 116. Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 29 Shields per second, up to 116. Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

16.name: Quantum Entanglement
16.description: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3.0 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.
16.longDescription: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3.0 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

16.name: Gravity Well
16.description: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.
16.longDescription: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

16.name: Repulsor
16.description: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.
16.longDescription: Enemies hit by a Warp Rift explosion are knocked away from the center.

16.name: Interference
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift detonations have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.

20.name: Construct Additional Pylons
20.description: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.
20.longDescription: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

20.name: Gate Keeper
20.description: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.
20.longDescription: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.Only one Null Gate may be active at a time.

20.name: Shoot 'Em Up
20.description: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.  Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.
20.longDescription: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.  Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

20.name: Probius Loop
20.description: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.
20.longDescription: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.

1.name: The Plaguelands
1.description: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1.00 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.
1.longDescription: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1.00 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

1.name: Blighted Frost
1.description: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.50 seconds.
1.longDescription: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.50 seconds.

1.name: Barbed Chains
1.description: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 15 for 4.00 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 15 for 4.00 seconds.

4.name: Strip Shields
4.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 133 Shield, stacking up to 2 times.Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 277 bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.
4.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 133 Shield, stacking up to 2 times.Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 277 bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.

4.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
4.description: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery. Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.
4.longDescription: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery. Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

4.name: Armor of the Archlich
4.description: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4.00 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 47 damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4.00 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 47 damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Accelerated Decay
7.description: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 20% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.
7.longDescription: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 20% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 6 times.

7.name: Chilling Touch
7.description: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 100%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 100%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Ice Cold
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 5 seconds and increase its damage by 250%.
7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 5 seconds and increase its damage by 250%.

10.name: Frost Blast
10.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 118 damage to its target and 282 damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 1.50 seconds.
10.longDescription: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 118 damage to its target and 282 damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 1.50 seconds.

10.name: Shadow Fissure
10.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.50 seconds, dealing 369 damage to enemy Heroes in its area.
10.longDescription: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.50 seconds, dealing 369 damage to enemy Heroes in its area.

13.name: Icy Grasp
13.description: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 10%. Each time Kel'thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, its Slow duration is increased by 0.50 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 10%. Each time Kel'thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, its Slow duration is increased by 0.50 seconds.

13.name: Chains of Ice
13.description: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1.00 second.
13.longDescription: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1.00 second.

13.name: Chain-Link
13.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.
13.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

16.name: Arcane Echoes
16.description: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.50 seconds.
16.longDescription: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.50 seconds.

16.name: Hungering Cold
16.description: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 56 damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.
16.longDescription: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 56 damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

16.name: Power of Icecrown
16.description: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

20.name: Deathchill
20.description: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.
20.longDescription: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

20.name: Might of the Scourge
20.description: Hitting a Hero with Shadow Fissure resets its cooldown.
20.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Shadow Fissure resets its cooldown.

20.name: Shifting Malice
20.description: Activate to dash forward, dealing 154 damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.
20.longDescription: Activate to dash forward, dealing 154 damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

20.name: The Damned Return
20.description: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.
20.longDescription: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

1.name: Veteran Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.

1.name: Ace In The Hole
1.description: Deal 15% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.
1.longDescription: Deal 15% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.

1.name: Exterminator
1.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.

4.name: Fight or Flight
4.description: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Sustaining Rounds
4.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.
4.longDescription: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.

4.name: Behemoth Armor
4.description: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health.   Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health.   Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.

7.name: Fuel The Rush
7.description: While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.
7.longDescription: While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.

7.name: Unstable Compound
7.description: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%, and enemies hit by it are Slowed by 10% for 2.50 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%, and enemies hit by it are Slowed by 10% for 2.50 seconds.

7.name: Heavy Slugs
7.description: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6.00 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6.00 seconds.

10.name: Hyperion
10.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 69 damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 826 damage.
10.longDescription: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 69 damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 826 damage.

10.name: Raynor's Raider
10.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 87 damage per second and regenerates 78 Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 87 damage per second and regenerates 78 Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

13.name: Debilitating Rounds
13.description: Decrease the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.
13.longDescription: Decrease the cooldown of Penetrating Round by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.

13.name: Rallying Cry
13.description: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.
13.longDescription: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.

13.name: Giddy-Up
13.description: Gain 8% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 8% more Movement Speed.
13.longDescription: Gain 8% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 8% more Movement Speed.

16.name: Paint Them Red
16.description: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage it deals to Heroes.
16.longDescription: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

16.name: Give Me More!
16.description: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.
16.longDescription: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

16.name: Bounty Hunter
16.description: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3.00% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 5 Armor for 3 seconds. Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.
16.longDescription: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3.00% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 5 Armor for 3 seconds. Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

20.name: Indomitable Resolve
20.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

20.name: Dusk Wing
20.description: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.
20.longDescription: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.

20.name: Weak Spot Acquired
20.description: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.

20.name: Execute
20.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.
20.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.

1.name: Volatile Acid
1.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.
1.longDescription: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage to non-Heroes is increased by 50%.

1.name: Corpse Feeders
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 50% less damage from non-Heroic sources.
1.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings take 50% less damage from non-Heroic sources.

1.name: Infest
1.description: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 100% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.
1.longDescription: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 100% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

4.name: Envenomed Spines
4.description: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 239 damage over 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 239 damage over 5 seconds.

4.name: Medusa Blades
4.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

4.name: Serrated Spines
4.description: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.30.
4.longDescription: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.30.

7.name: Baneling Massacre
7.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings.
7.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings.

7.name: Viscous Acid
7.description: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.50 seconds.
7.longDescription: Banelings slow enemies by 20% for 1.50 seconds.

7.name: Bile Drop
7.description: Quest: Passively increases the damage of Infested Drop by 50%. Each Hero hit by the impact damage of Infested Drop increases this bonus by 5%. Reward: Upon reaching 150% bonus damage, increase the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%.
7.longDescription: Quest: Passively increases the damage of Infested Drop by 50%. Each Hero hit by the impact damage of Infested Drop increases this bonus by 5%. Reward: Upon reaching 150% bonus damage, increase the impact radius of Infested Drop by 20%.

10.name: Devouring Maw
10.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 92 damage per second.Usable on Unstoppable enemies.
10.longDescription: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 92 damage per second.Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

10.name: Nydus Network
10.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time.Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther. Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.50 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 10 Nydus Worms at a time.Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther. Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.50 seconds.

13.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
13.description: Zagara is healed for 75% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.
13.longDescription: Zagara is healed for 75% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

13.name: Protective Coating
13.description: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.
13.longDescription: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3.0 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3.0 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Brood Expansion
16.description: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 7 seconds and its Mana cost by 30.
16.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 7 seconds and its Mana cost by 30.

16.name: Corrosive Saliva
16.description: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2.50% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2.50% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Mutalisk
16.description: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

20.name: Tyrant Maw
20.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

20.name: Endless Creep
20.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10.0% Movement Speed.
20.longDescription: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10.0% Movement Speed.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 95 damage to the target, and 237 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 95 damage to the target, and 237 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

1.name: Death's Reach
1.description: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35.00%.
1.longDescription: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35.00%.

1.name: On a Pale Horse
1.description: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5.00 seconds, to a minimum of 15.00 seconds.

1.name: Shackler
