1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

1.name: Shade
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.
1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 20 seconds.

4.name: Reaper's Toll
4.description: Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Spectral Scythe. Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 20 Heroes with Spectral Scythe. Reward: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 3 seconds.

4.name: Grim Scythe
4.description: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1.00 second, up to 12 seconds.
4.longDescription: Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1.00 second, up to 12 seconds.

4.name: Jailors
4.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum. Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 40% Movement and Attack Speed.
4.longDescription: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum. Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors. Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 40% Movement and Attack Speed.

7.name: Harvest Vitality
7.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.
7.longDescription: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

7.name: Weaken
7.description: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.

7.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
7.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.50% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.20% of his maximum Mana.
7.longDescription: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.50% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.20% of his maximum Mana.

10.name: Poison Nova
10.description: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal 593 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.
10.longDescription: After a short delay, release poisonous missiles that deal 593 damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

10.name: Skeletal Mages
10.description: Vector TargetingSummon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 49 damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.
10.longDescription: Vector TargetingSummon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 49 damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

13.name: Echoes of Death
13.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.
13.longDescription: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 60% damage.

13.name: Rapid Harvest
13.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

13.name: Executioner
13.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Amplify Damage
16.description: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.

16.name: Corpse Explosion
16.description: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 57 damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.
16.longDescription: When Skeletal Warriors die they explode for 57 damage in a small area. Deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

16.name: Bone Spear
16.description: Deal 239 damage to enemies in a line.
16.longDescription: Deal 239 damage to enemies in a line.

20.name: Andariel's Visage
20.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt.Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.
20.longDescription: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt.Passive: Skeletal Warriors deal 50% increased damage.

20.name: Cold Hand of Death
20.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2.00 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.Passive: Skeletal Warrior attacks Slow enemies by 30% for 2.00 seconds.

20.name: Mortal Wound
20.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

20.name: Kalan's Edict
20.description: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.
20.longDescription: Skeletal Warrior attacks reduce the cooldown of Xul's Heroic Ability by 1%.

1.name: Consume Vitality
1.description: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for 4% of his maximum Health.
1.longDescription: Skeletal Swing's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit heal Leoric for 4% of his maximum Health.

1.name: Fealty Unto Death
1.description: When a nearby friendly or enemy Minion dies, Leoric restores 1% of his maximum Health and 5 Mana.
1.longDescription: When a nearby friendly or enemy Minion dies, Leoric restores 1% of his maximum Health and 5 Mana.

1.name: Ossein Renewal
1.description: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.

4.name: Ghastly Reach
4.description: Increase the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.
4.longDescription: Increase the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

4.name: Paralyzing Rage
4.description: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.
4.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.

4.name: Kneel, Peasants!
4.description: Skeletal Swing deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
4.longDescription: Skeletal Swing deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

7.name: Willing Vessel
7.description: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.
7.longDescription: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Drain Momentum
7.description: Drain Hope no longer reduces Leoric's Movement Speed. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Drain Hope no longer reduces Leoric's Movement Speed. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

7.name: Hopelessness
7.description: Increase the range of Drain Hope by 25%.
7.longDescription: Increase the range of Drain Hope by 25%.

10.name: Entomb
10.description: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

10.name: March of the Black King
10.description: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 260 damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.
10.longDescription: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 260 damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

13.name: Unyielding Despair
13.description: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Drain Hope's cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds for every 1 second it is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, its cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

13.name: Hardened Bones
13.description: Gain 20 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 20 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 3 seconds.

13.name: Ominous Wraith
13.description: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Wraith Walk's duration by 100%. Enemy Heroes that come in contact with the wraith deal 50% less damage for 4 seconds.

16.name: Crushing Hope
16.description: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.
16.longDescription: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

16.name: Royal Focus
16.description: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.
16.longDescription: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

16.name: Mithril Mace
16.description: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%. Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.
16.longDescription: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%. Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

20.name: Buried Alive
20.description: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 52 damage every 1 second.
20.longDescription: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 52 damage every 1 second.

20.name: Death March
20.description: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Spectral Leech
20.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.50% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.50% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

20.name: Burning Despair
20.description: Deal 42 damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.
20.longDescription: Deal 42 damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

20.name: Shroud of the Dead King
20.description: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.
20.longDescription: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

1.name: Echo of the Elements
1.description: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning. Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25. Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.
1.longDescription: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning. Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25. Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

1.name: Crash Lightning
1.description: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360. Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.
1.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360. Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

1.name: Rolling Thunder
1.description: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana and 2.50% of his maximum Health.Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.
1.longDescription: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana and 2.50% of his maximum Health.Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.

4.name: Feral Resilience
4.description: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.
4.longDescription: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

4.name: Frostwolf Pack
4.description: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero. Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero. Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

4.name: Mana Tide
4.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Maelstrom Weapon
7.description: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.00. Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%. Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.
7.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.00. Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%. Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

7.name: Ancestral Wrath
7.description: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.
7.longDescription: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Sundering
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 302 damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1.00 second.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 302 damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1.00 second.

10.name: Earthquake
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 52 damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 52 damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

13.name: Grace Of Air
13.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.
13.longDescription: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

13.name: Frostwolf's Grace
13.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.
13.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.

13.name: Spirit Shield
13.description: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Tempest Fury
16.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.
16.longDescription: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

16.name: Thunderstorm
16.description: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds. Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%. Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.
16.longDescription: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds. Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%. Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.

16.name: Alpha Wolf
16.description: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Worldbreaker
20.description: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

20.name: Earthen Shields
20.description: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Wind Rush
20.description: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.
20.longDescription: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

1.name: Reactive Parry
1.description: Using Twin Blades grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%.Stores up to 2 charges.
1.longDescription: Using Twin Blades grants 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 50%.Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Amateur Opponent
1.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150.0% bonus damage to non-Heroes.
1.longDescription: Twin Blades attacks deal 150.0% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.20 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.50 Attack Damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.20 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.50 Attack Damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

4.name: Psionic Synergy
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 20 Armor for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 20 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Shield Battery
4.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 100% faster while its Shield is active, and the Shield duration is increased by 1 second.
4.longDescription: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 100% faster while its Shield is active, and the Shield duration is increased by 1 second.

4.name: Shield Surge
4.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.
4.longDescription: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.

7.name: Solarite Reaper
7.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.
7.longDescription: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

7.name: Warp Sickness
7.description: Phase Prism also Slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Phase Prism also Slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Chrono Surge
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 75% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 75% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Suppression Pulse
10.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 119 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.
10.longDescription: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 119 damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

10.name: Purifier Beam
10.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 191 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.
10.longDescription: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 191 damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

13.name: Templar's Zeal
13.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 5 seconds.

13.name: Triple Strike
13.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.
13.longDescription: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Graviton Vortex
13.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 70 to 35. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by 1.25 seconds.
13.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 70 to 35. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by 1.25 seconds.

13.name: Phase Bulwark
13.description: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.
13.longDescription: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.

16.name: Titan Killer
16.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 0.50% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.50% when empowered by Twin Blades.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 0.50% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.50% when empowered by Twin Blades.

16.name: Force of Will
16.description: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

16.name: Blades of a Templar
16.description: Increase Attack Speed by 30%. Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 30%. Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Orbital Bombardment
20.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.
20.longDescription: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Target Purified
20.description: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.
20.longDescription: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

20.name: Zealot Charge
20.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.
20.longDescription: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

20.name: Plasma Burn
20.description: While Shield Overload is active, deal 73 damage per second to nearby enemies.
20.longDescription: While Shield Overload is active, deal 73 damage per second to nearby enemies.

1.name: Lion's Maw
1.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 120. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

1.name: Overpower
1.description: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage.
1.longDescription: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage.

1.name: High King's Quest
1.description: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 45 Base Attack Damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 45 Base Attack Damage.

4.name: Taunt
4.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 30%.
4.longDescription: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 30%.

4.name: Colossus Smash
4.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 166 damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%.Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.
4.longDescription: Smash a target enemy, dealing 166 damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%.Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

4.name: Twin Blades of Fury
4.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2.00 seconds.Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%.Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2.00 seconds.Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%.Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

7.name: Lionheart
7.description: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 50%.
7.longDescription: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 50%.

7.name: Second Wind
7.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Victory Rush
7.description: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 364 Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 364 Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

10.name: Shield Wall
10.description: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.
10.longDescription: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.

10.name: Warbringer
10.description: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 23. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.
10.longDescription: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 23. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

13.name: Juggernaut

10.longDescription: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 206 damage. Enemies in the center take 618 damage instead and are Stunned for 0.50 seconds.

10.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 250 damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.
10.longDescription: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 250 damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

13.name: Cauterize Wounds
13.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

13.name: Tempered Flame
13.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

13.name: Resilient Flame
13.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%. This effect has a 15 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%. This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

16.name: Giant Scorcher
16.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.
16.longDescription: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

16.name: Meteor Bomb
16.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 229 damage to all nearby enemies.
16.longDescription: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 229 damage to all nearby enemies.

16.name: Blast Echo
16.description: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.
16.longDescription: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

20.name: Flames of Sulfuron
20.description: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds, and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Sulfuras Smash slows enemies by 50% for 2 seconds, and enemies in the center are stunned for an additional 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Lava Surge
20.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Heroic Difficulty
20.description: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.
20.longDescription: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

20.name: Submerge
20.description: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 624 Health over 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 624 Health over 3 seconds.

1.name: Bonds of Justice
1.description: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15. Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75. Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15. Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75. Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

1.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
1.description: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.50 seconds.
1.longDescription: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.50 seconds.

1.name: Naisha's Memento
1.description: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.
1.longDescription: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.

4.name: Pin Down
4.description: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives. Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 15%. Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 30%. Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives. Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 15%. Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 30%. Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

4.name: Blade Dance
4.description: Using Fan of Knives deals 52 Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.
4.longDescription: Using Fan of Knives deals 52 Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.

4.name: Sudden Vengeance
4.description: Using Blink within 0.35 seconds of Spirit of Vengeance hitting an enemy Hero causes the shadow to explode, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 5% of their maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Using Blink within 0.35 seconds of Spirit of Vengeance hitting an enemy Hero causes the shadow to explode, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 5% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Elune's Wrath
7.description: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 80 damage when it impacts.
7.longDescription: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 80 damage when it impacts.

7.name: Bonds of Corruption
7.description: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Physical Armor reduced by 25 for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Physical Armor reduced by 25 for 3 seconds.

7.name: Ruthless Spirit
7.description: Spirit of Vengeance's damage is increased by 3% per Minion, Mercenary, or enemy Summon hit, and 24% per enemy Hero hit.
7.longDescription: Spirit of Vengeance's damage is increased by 3% per Minion, Mercenary, or enemy Summon hit, and 24% per enemy Hero hit.

10.name: Containment Disc
10.description: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.
10.longDescription: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

10.name: Warden's Cage
10.description: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

13.name: Bladed Armor
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5.0 seconds, up to 20 Armor.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5.0 seconds, up to 20 Armor.

13.name: Chain Gang
13.description: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Shadow Armor
13.description: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.00 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.
13.longDescription: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.00 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Cruel Chain
16.description: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.50 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.
16.longDescription: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.50 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.

16.name: Vengeful Knives
16.description: For each enemy Hero Spirit of Vengeance hits, Maiev's next Fan of Knives deals 1.50% maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes.
16.longDescription: For each enemy Hero Spirit of Vengeance hits, Maiev's next Fan of Knives deals 1.50% maximum Health as bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

16.name: Armored Assault
16.description: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.
16.longDescription: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Vengeance
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Huntress
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.
20.longDescription: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Shadow Strike
20.description: Activate to deal 78 damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.
20.longDescription: Activate to deal 78 damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

1.name: Monster Hunter
1.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.
1.longDescription: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

1.name: Caltrops
1.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 62 damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1 second. Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred. Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 62 damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1 second. Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred. Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

1.longDescription: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

4.name: Puncturing Arrow
4.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

4.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.
4.longDescription: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

4.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

7.longDescription: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 125 damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

7.longDescription: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

7.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.
7.longDescription: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

10.name: Strafe
10.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 62 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4.0 seconds.
10.longDescription: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 62 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4.0 seconds.

10.longDescription: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 260 damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.50 seconds.Stores up to 2 charges.

13.longDescription: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

13.longDescription: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

13.longDescription: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

16.longDescription: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.50 seconds.

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred and the time it takes before Hatred expires is increased by 2 seconds.

16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.longDescription: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 35 damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

20.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

20.longDescription: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

20.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.20.

1.longDescription: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 3 seconds.

1.description: Quest: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe gathered, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds.  Reward: Once 25 Regeneration Globes have been gathered, the range of Run and Gun is increased by 50%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Movement Speed by 1% for each Regeneration Globe gathered, up to 25%. Lasts 2 seconds.  Reward: Once 25 Regeneration Globes have been gathered, the range of Run and Gun is increased by 50%.

1.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Run and Gun by 0.80 seconds.

4.longDescription: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

4.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Minigun by 2 seconds. Increase the damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

4.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

7.longDescription: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

7.longDescription: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

7.longDescription: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

10.longDescription: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100.0% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

10.longDescription: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 148 damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

13.longDescription: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

13.longDescription: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

13.longDescription: Increases Overkill's range by 25%.

16.longDescription: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

16.longDescription: Overkill also slows enemy movement speed by 30.00%.

16.longDescription: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

20.longDescription: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later, dealing 332 damage in its area.

20.longDescription: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

20.longDescription: Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

1.name: Transcendence

1.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 108 and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

1.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2 seconds.

1.longDescription: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 15 Mana, grants a stack of Insight, and gives 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.75 seconds.

4.longDescription: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 416 Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

4.longDescription: Place an Air Ally that grants vision and reveals a large area around it. Has 78 Health and lasts 40 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.Stores up to 2 charges.

7.longDescription: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.

7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

10.longDescription: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1127 if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

10.longDescription: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7.0% of their maximum Health.

13.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.longDescription: Increases Deadly Reach's duration by 100%.

13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3.0 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.longDescription: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.

16.longDescription: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3.00 seconds later.

16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 75% for 3 seconds.

20.longDescription: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

20.longDescription: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.

20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.longDescription: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

1.name: Martyrdom

1.longDescription: Each stack of Desperation increases Desperate Plea's healing by 30%.

1.name: Clemency

1.longDescription: Searing Lash deals 50% more damage to enemies who are Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed.

1.name: Pity the Frail

1.longDescription: Allies below 50% Health receive 25% more healing from Zeal.

4.longDescription: Casting Inquisition instantly removes all stacks of Desperation and restores 75 Mana per stack removed.

4.longDescription: Searing Lash's first strike restores 10 Mana per Hero hit, and its second strike restores 25 Mana per Hero hit.

7.longDescription: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.

7.longDescription: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.

10.longDescription: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside.

13.longDescription: Casting Desperate Plea on an ally heals Whitemane for 125. Does not grant Zeal.

13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

13.longDescription: Whenever Zeal is applied to allies other than Whitemane, it grants them 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

16.longDescription: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175.

16.longDescription: Searing Lash's second strike deals 25% more damage and reduces Searing Lash's cooldown to 1 second if it hits a Hero.

20.name: Scarlet Crusade
20.description: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 1.00 second.
20.longDescription: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 1.

20.longDescription: Divine Reckoning deals 30% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.

20.longDescription: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 75%.

20.longDescription: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 damage over 4 seconds.

1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

4.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed slow from 25% to 50% and the duration from 2.50 seconds to 3.50 seconds.

7.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 50% for 3 seconds.

7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same enemy deals 70.00% bonus damage and Stuns them for 0.25 seconds.

10.longDescription: Transform for 20.00 seconds, gaining 1095 Health.

13.longDescription: Muradin heals for 5% of his Max Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

13.longDescription: Deal 20 damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against a Hero that is Rooted, Stunned or Slowed increase this damage by 100% for 3 seconds.

16.longDescription: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by 40.00%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

16.longDescription: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.50 seconds.Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.50 seconds.

16.longDescription: Activate to heal Muradin for 30% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

1.longDescription: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to 75% of the Shield gained by Tyrael.

1.name: Ardent Restoration
1.description: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 16 Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.
1.longDescription: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 16 Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.

4.name: Stalwart Angel
4.description: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting.
4.longDescription: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting.

4.name: Bound by Law
4.description: Increase El'druin's Might's Slow by 10%. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase El'druin's Might's Slow by 10%. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.

4.name: Divine Vigor
4.description: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds heal for 50% of the damage dealt.
4.longDescription: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds heal for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Reciprocate
7.description: When Tyrael's Shield from Righteousness expires or is destroyed, it deals 177 damage to nearby enemies.
7.longDescription: When Tyrael's Shield from Righteousness expires or is destroyed, it deals 177 damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Purge Evil
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 45% for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 45% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Swift Retribution
7.description: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

10.name: Judgment
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 156 damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 78 damage.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 156 damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 78 damage.

10.name: Sanctification
10.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

13.name: Sword of Justice
13.description: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.
13.longDescription: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.

13.name: Holy Ground
13.description: Create a ring for 3 seconds that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.
13.longDescription: Create a ring for 3 seconds that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

13.name: Law and Order
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 25%.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 25%.

16.name: Horadric Reforging
16.description: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Burning Halo
16.description: Both Tyrael and El'druin deal 19 damage per second to nearby enemies. Teleporting increases this damage from Tyrael by 150% for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Both Tyrael and El'druin deal 19 damage per second to nearby enemies. Teleporting increases this damage from Tyrael by 150% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Smite the Wicked
16.description: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.
16.longDescription: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

20.name: Angel of Justice
20.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Holy Arena
20.description: Increase the duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increase the damage of allies inside by 25%.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increase the damage of allies inside by 25%.

20.name: Defense of the Angels
20.description: Activate to gain 40 Armor for 5 seconds.Each time Righteousness's Shield absorbs damage, Defense of the Angel's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 40 Armor for 5 seconds.Each time Righteousness's Shield absorbs damage, Defense of the Angel's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

20.name: Seal of El'druin
20.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

1.name: Sustaining Power
1.description: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.
1.longDescription: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

1.name: Extended Lightning
1.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%. Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge. Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.
1.longDescription: Reduce Sadism by 10%. Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge. Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

1.name: Ruthless Momentum
1.description: Basic Abilities recharge 20% faster while above 80% Health.
1.longDescription: Basic Abilities recharge 20% faster while above 80% Health.

4.name: Chaos Reigns
4.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 50. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 80 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.name: Negatively Charged
4.description: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%. Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 5%.
4.longDescription: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%. Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 5%.

4.name: Show of Force
4.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 80 damage.
4.longDescription: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 80 damage.

7.name: Dissonance
7.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Hindered Motion
7.description: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 2.00 seconds.
7.longDescription: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 2.00 seconds.

7.name: Applied Force
7.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.
7.longDescription: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

10.name: Deadly Charge
10.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 208 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.
10.longDescription: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 208 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

10.name: Counter-Strike
10.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1.00 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 286 damage.
10.longDescription: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1.00 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 286 damage.

13.name: Blade of the Highlord
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 7% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 35%. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 7% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 35%. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

13.name: Pure Malice
13.description: Increase Sadism by 10.00% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40.00%.Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Increase Sadism by 10.00% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40.00%.Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

13.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
13.description: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

16.name: Lethal Onslaught
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50.00% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50.00% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Lightning Barrage
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2.0 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2.0 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

16.name: Mocking Strikes
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 2.50 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 2.50 seconds.

20.name: Counter-Strike (Lvl 20)
20.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1.00 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 286 damage.This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.
20.longDescription: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1.00 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 286 damage.This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

20.longDescription: Activate teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

20.longDescription: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

1.name: Fish Eye
1.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies. Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies. Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses.Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.

4.longDescription: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed. Reward: After Sliming 15 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125. Reward: After Sliming 30 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

4.longDescription: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

4.longDescription: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 15%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

7.name: Black Lagoon

7.longDescription: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Additionally, Safety Bubble's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

10.name: March of the Murlocs

10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 130 damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

10.longDescription: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

13.longDescription: Safety Bubble restores 40.00% of Murky's maximum Health.

13.longDescription: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

13.longDescription: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.

16.longDescription: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

16.longDescription: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

16.longDescription: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

20.longDescription: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

20.longDescription: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 14248%.

20.longDescription: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

20.longDescription: Reduces the Cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2.00 seconds.

10.longDescription: Emit bile that deals 38 damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. Stitches gains 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

10.longDescription: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4.00 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 285 damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

16.longDescription: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.
