16.longDescription: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

20.name: Call of the Wildhammer
20.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.
20.longDescription: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

20.name: Wind Tunnel
20.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.
20.longDescription: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.10.
20.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.10.

20.name: Epic Mount
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 30 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 30 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

1.name: Spine Launcher
1.description: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.50 seconds, but deal 40.00% less damage.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.50 seconds, but deal 40.00% less damage.

1.name: Fetid Touch
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

1.name: Low Blow
1.description: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30.00% Health.
1.longDescription: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30.00% Health.

1.name: Poppin' Pustules
1.description: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.50 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 100% and applies its damage and Slow in an area.
1.longDescription: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.50 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 100% and applies its damage and Slow in an area.

4.name: One Good Spread...
4.description: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2.0 seconds.
4.longDescription: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2.0 seconds.

4.name: Biotic Armor
4.description: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus by 35 for 2.50 seconds.
4.longDescription: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus by 35 for 2.50 seconds.

4.name: Vigorous Reuptake
4.description: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30.00% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.
4.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30.00% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.

7.name: The Long Pitch
7.description: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.

7.name: Growing Infestation
7.description: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4.00 seconds.
7.longDescription: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4.00 seconds.

7.name: Targeted Excision
7.description: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds.

10.name: Flailing Swipe
10.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 50 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.
10.longDescription: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 50 damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

10.name: Massive Shove
10.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 198 damage and Stunning them for 0.50 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.
10.longDescription: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 198 damage and Stunning them for 0.50 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

13.name: Reactive Ballistospores
13.description: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.This effect has a 10 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

13.name: It Hungers
13.description: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 15 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.
13.longDescription: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 15 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

13.name: Lingering Spines
13.description: Lurking Arm persists for 1.50 seconds after it is canceled.
13.longDescription: Lurking Arm persists for 1.50 seconds after it is canceled.

13.name: Virulent Reaction
13.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

16.name: Superstrain
16.description: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 260 Health.
16.longDescription: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 260 Health.

16.name: Universal Carrier
16.description: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 50.00%.
16.longDescription: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 50.00%.

16.name: Pox Populi
16.description: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

20.name: Controlled Chaos
20.description: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range.  Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 30 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 100 to 50.
20.longDescription: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range.  Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 30 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 100 to 50.

20.name: Push Comes To Shove
20.description: Massive Shove Slows its target by 50% for 5 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.
20.longDescription: Massive Shove Slows its target by 50% for 5 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

20.name: Top Off
20.description: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.
20.longDescription: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.

20.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
20.description: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2.0 seconds.
20.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, applying a Weighted Pustule to enemy Heroes inside and Silencing them for 2.0 seconds.

1.name: Pursuit of Flame
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%. Quest: Gather 20 Regen Globes. Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.
1.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%. Quest: Gather 20 Regen Globes. Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

1.name: Echoed Corruption
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption. Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption. Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

4.name: Health Funnel
4.description: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.
4.longDescription: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

4.name: Improved Life Tap
4.description: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 35%.
4.longDescription: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 35%.

4.name: Consume Soul
4.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 380 Health.Stores up to 2 charges.
4.longDescription: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 380 Health.Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.0 second.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.0 second.

7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
7.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 25% if they are afflicted by Corruption.
7.longDescription: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 25% if they are afflicted by Corruption.

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Increases Spell Power by 15.00% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.
7.longDescription: Increases Spell Power by 15.00% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: After 0.50 seconds, deal 125 damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.
10.longDescription: After 0.50 seconds, deal 125 damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: Channel to summon a rain of meteors in an area over 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 172 damage in a small area.
10.longDescription: Channel to summon a rain of meteors in an area over 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 172 damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.50 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.50 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

13.name: Harvest Life
13.description: Drain Life heals for 50% more Health when used on Heroes.
13.longDescription: Drain Life heals for 50% more Health when used on Heroes.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.description: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but his respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but his respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

13.name: Healthstone
13.description: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 8% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 8% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Ruinous Affliction
16.description: Corruption deals an additional 81 damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 242 damage.
16.longDescription: Corruption deals an additional 81 damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 242 damage.

16.name: Darkness Within
16.description: After using Life Tap, the next Ability Gul'dan casts has 25% increased Spell Power.
16.longDescription: After using Life Tap, the next Ability Gul'dan casts has 25% increased Spell Power.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.
20.longDescription: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

1.name: Immolation
1.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 23 damage a second for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 23 damage a second for 4 seconds.

1.name: Battered Assault
1.description: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.
1.longDescription: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

1.name: Unending Hatred
1.description: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage. Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage. Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

4.name: Rapid Chase

4.longDescription: Dive grants 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

4.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.
4.longDescription: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

4.name: Unbound
4.description: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.
4.longDescription: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

7.name: Reflexive Block
7.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.
7.longDescription: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

7.name: Thirsting Blade
7.description: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.
7.longDescription: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

7.name: Hunter's Onslaught
7.description: Basic Abilities heal for 25.00% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.
7.longDescription: Basic Abilities heal for 25.00% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

10.name: Metamorphosis
10.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 48 damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 208 for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.
10.longDescription: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 48 damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 208 for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

10.name: The Hunt
10.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 261 damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.
10.longDescription: Charge to target unit, dealing 261 damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

13.name: Nimble Defender
13.description: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.
13.longDescription: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Elusive Strike
13.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3.0 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.
13.longDescription: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3.0 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: While active, Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.
13.longDescription: While active, Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Marked for Death
16.description: Dive deals an extra 187 damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Dive deals an extra 187 damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

16.name: Fiery Brand
16.description: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 4th attack against the same Hero deals an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Blades of Azzinoth
16.description: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Form
20.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.
20.longDescription: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

20.name: Nowhere to Hide
20.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.
20.longDescription: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

1.name: Rush-down
1.description: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 7 seconds.
1.longDescription: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 7 seconds.

1.name: Hit the Nitrous
1.description: Initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 103% extra damage.
1.longDescription: Initial speed of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

1.name: Crash Course
1.description: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1.00 second per Hero hit.
1.longDescription: Quest:Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

1.name: Pro Moves
1.description: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.50 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.
1.longDescription: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

4.name: Diverting Power
4.description: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by 30% for the duration.
4.longDescription: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by an additional 30% for the duration.

4.name: Get Through This!
4.description: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.

4.name: Fusion Generator
4.description: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1.00%.Max of 15% Charge gained per use.
4.longDescription: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%.  Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

4.name: Bring It On
4.description: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.
4.longDescription: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

7.name: Coming Through
7.description: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by -95%.
7.longDescription: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

7.name: Dazer Zone
7.description: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

7.name: Aggression Matrix
7.description: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

7.name: Nuclear Option
7.description: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

10.name: Bunny Hop
10.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.50 seconds, dealing 62 damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.Requires Mech Mode.
10.longDescription: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

10.name: Big Shot
10.description: Deal 260 damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.Requires Pilot Mode.
10.longDescription: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

13.name: Expensive Plating
13.description: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.
13.longDescription: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

13.name: Emergency Shielding
13.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 218 damage over 6 seconds.This effect has a 15 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

13.name: Ablative Armor
13.description: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health is reduced by 50%.This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.
13.longDescription: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health are reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

16.name: Torpedo Dash
16.description: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.Requires Pilot Mode.
16.longDescription: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.  Requires Pilot Mode.

16.name: GG, WP
16.description: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.
16.longDescription: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

16.name: Nanoweave Suit
16.description: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50.00% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.
16.longDescription: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

16.name: Suppressing Fire
16.description: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.50 seconds.
16.longDescription: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Stop and Pop
20.description: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.
20.longDescription: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

20.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
20.description: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.50 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.
20.longDescription: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

20.name: Concussive Pulse
20.description: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 147 damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.Requires Pilot Mode.
20.longDescription: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.  Requires Pilot Mode.

20.name: MEKAfall
20.description: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 210 damage to enemies in the impact area.
20.longDescription: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.

1.name: Silver Touch
1.description: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion. Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 90 to 70. Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 50, and its range is increased by 50%.

1.name: Wave of Light
1.description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1.0 second.
1.longDescription: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance. Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1.0 second.

1.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
1.description: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times. Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.50 seconds.Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.50% of Uther's maximum Mana.
1.longDescription: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times. Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.50 seconds.Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.50% of Uther's maximum Mana.

4.longDescription: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

4.name: Pursuit of Justice
4.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Holy Fire
4.description: Deal 14 damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

1.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 15% Spell Power for 14 seconds, up to 30.0000%.

4.longDescription: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 140 Shield for 6 seconds.

7.longDescription: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by 75% for 4 seconds.Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

10.name: Stay Awhile and Listen

10.longDescription: After 1.00 second, Channel for 3.00 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2.00 seconds after.Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

10.longDescription: Vector TargetingAfter 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

13.longDescription: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 80% more.

13.longDescription: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 35% of the healing amount.

13.name: Ancient Blessings

13.longDescription: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 64 damage in an area and heal for 94 for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.

16.longDescription: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

16.longDescription: If at least 3 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 10 Armor and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

16.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

20.longDescription: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 2 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

20.longDescription: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.50 seconds.

20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems by 25 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Each time Brightwing heals an Allied Hero with Soothing Mist, she gains a stack of Bribe. Use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

4.longDescription: Phase Shifting to an ally casts a free Pixie Dust on them and reveals a large area around them and all enemies in it for 6 seconds.

10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 315 damage and pushing enemies away. Passive: Increases the healing of Soothing Mist by 5%.

Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.Current number of Bribe stacks: 0
1.longDescription: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 200. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

4.longDescription: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20.00% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

4.longDescription: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 35 Health per second.

4.longDescription: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 10 seconds, causing 182 damage.

7.longDescription: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

7.longDescription: Activate to have each Viking deal 105 damage to nearby enemies.

7.longDescription: All Vikings gain a 114 to 229 point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

10.name: Longboat Raid!

The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15.0 seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.
10.longDescription: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15.0 seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

10.longDescription: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

13.longDescription: Olaf deals 35 damage every second to nearby enemies.

13.longDescription: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.50 seconds.

13.longDescription: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

16.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

20.longDescription: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

20.longDescription: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

20.longDescription: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by 50%.

20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 43 damage to the target, and 109 damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

1.name: Put Some English On It

1.longDescription: Increase Frag Launcher's travel distance by 50%, but does not increase its speed.

4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.50, up to 100.

4.longDescription: Quest: Hit enemy Heroes 12 times with Concussion Mine. Reward: Concussion Mine deals 40% more damage and knocks enemies back 30% farther.

4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 7 Heroes with Steel Trap. Reward: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 3.

7.longDescription: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50%.

7.longDescription: Steel Trap no longer Roots enemies, and instead Slows them by 90.00% for 3.50 seconds.

10.name: RIP-Tire

While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 494, 650, or 806 damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).
10.longDescription: Create a motorized bomb with 551 Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 494, 650, or 806 damage to enemies depending on how close they are to the center of the blast (with the highest amount near the center).

10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 780 damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Altar and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

13.longDescription: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 60% for 2 seconds upon landing.

13.longDescription: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

16.longDescription: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.50 seconds.

16.longDescription: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

20.name: Extra Oomph

20.longDescription: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

20.longDescription: Reduce Rocket Ride's cooldown by 70 seconds.

20.longDescription: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.

20.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

1.name: Vigor

1.longDescription: Valeera regenerates an additional 2.5 Energy per second. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

1.longDescription: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 8 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

1.longDescription: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

4.longDescription: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.

4.longDescription: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 30% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

4.longDescription: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote award 2 Combo Points.

4.name: Wound Poison
4.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.
4.longDescription: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

7.name: Mutilate

7.longDescription: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

7.longDescription: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 4, up to 80. Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

7.longDescription: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150.00% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

10.name: Smoke Bomb
10.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.Using this Ability does not break Stealth.
10.longDescription: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

10.name: Cloak of Shadows
10.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.Using this Ability does not break Stealth.
10.longDescription: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

13.longDescription: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.

13.longDescription: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.

13.longDescription: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.

16.name: Seal Fate

16.longDescription: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.

16.longDescription: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

16.name: Thistle Tea
16.description: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.
16.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.

20.name: Adrenaline Rush

20.longDescription: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.

20.longDescription: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

20.longDescription: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.

20.longDescription: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20.00%.

1.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100.00% faster.

1.longDescription: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes. Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health. Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet. Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

4.longDescription: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.longDescription: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from 40% to 60%.

4.longDescription: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

7.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

7.longDescription: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

7.longDescription: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

10.longDescription: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 Health over 2.00 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 140 damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 312 Health.2.0 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

13.longDescription: Gain 30 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

13.longDescription: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

13.longDescription: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 208 damage to nearby enemies.Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

16.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 20 Armor for 2 seconds.

16.longDescription: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 60% of the amount healed.

16.longDescription: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 7 seconds.

20.longDescription: Life-Binder activates 3 times over 6.00 seconds.

20.longDescription: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 9 seconds. Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.

10.longDescription: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

10.longDescription: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 11 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

13.longDescription: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 83 damage over 2 seconds, and up to 416 bonus damage to Shields.

13.longDescription: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

16.longDescription: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30.0%.

16.longDescription: While above 70 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.

16.longDescription: Safeguard gains a second charge. These charges cannot stack on a single target.

20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.

20.description: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2.0 seconds.
20.longDescription: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2.0 seconds.

20.description: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Altar for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.Does not require the Medivac Dropship Talent.
20.longDescription: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Altar for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.Does not require the Medivac Dropship Talent.

20.longDescription: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

1.name: Swift Sweep

1.longDescription: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

1.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

4.longDescription: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther. Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60. Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

7.longDescription: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

7.longDescription: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 100% of the damage against Heroes and 45% of the damage against non-Heroes.Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

10.longDescription: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 265 damage to all nearby enemies.

13.longDescription: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2.00 seconds.

13.longDescription: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

13.longDescription: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.longDescription: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

16.longDescription: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

20.longDescription: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

20.longDescription: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

20.longDescription: After 2.0 seconds, fly to a target location.

1.name: Rejuvenation

1.longDescription: Malfurion gains 100% base Health regeneration for every active Regrowth.

1.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by 3 seconds. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.

1.longDescription: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

4.longDescription: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 30% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.

4.longDescription: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, and persist on the ground 25% longer.

4.name: Vengeful Roots

4.longDescription: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 65 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds. Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's Basic Attack damage by 7.

7.longDescription: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 25%. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots is instantly reset. This can only occur every 10 seconds.

7.longDescription: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.
