1.name: Endurance Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 468 damage over 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 468 damage over 5 seconds.

1.name: Neural Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain 50 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.

1.name: New Habits
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 5 seconds. Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 5 seconds. Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes. Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

4.name: Feeding the Flame
4.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 2.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Adhesive Petroleum
4.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 30.0% for 2.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 30.0% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Oil Dispersal
4.description: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20.00% and Slow amount by 10.0%.
4.longDescription: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20.00% and Slow amount by 10.0%.

4.name: Meltdown
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 5.00% for 2.5 seconds, up to 30.0%.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 5.00% for 2.5 seconds, up to 30.0%.

7.name: Crossfire
7.description: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 145 bonus damage.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 145 bonus damage.

7.name: Grill and Kill
7.description: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times. Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.
7.longDescription: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times. Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.

7.name: Incinerator Gauntlets
7.description: Increase Basic Attack area by 15.00%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 70%. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.
7.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack area by 15.00%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 70%. Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.

10.name: Bunker Drop
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1492 Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 186 damage to enemies in a line. Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2.0 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1492 Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 186 damage to enemies in a line. Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2.0 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

10.name: Combustion
10.description: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60.0% and deal 54 damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1.0 second up to 5 seconds.Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 50% while Channeling.
10.longDescription: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60.0% and deal 54 damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1.0 second up to 5 seconds.Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 50% while Channeling.

13.name: Suppressive Fire
13.description: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 20% for 4 seconds, up to 40%.
13.longDescription: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 20% for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

13.name: Nanomachine Coating
13.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 40.0% for 2.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 40.0% for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Fuel Leak
13.description: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.
13.longDescription: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.

16.name: Thermal Protection
16.description: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 2 seconds.

16.name: Heat Treatment
16.description: Heal for 75.0% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.
16.longDescription: Heal for 75.0% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.

16.name: Juggernaut Plating
16.description: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.

20.name: Fortified Bunker
20.description: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.

20.name: Flash Fire
20.description: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60.0%.
20.longDescription: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60.0%.

20.name: Burn Notice
20.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5.0% and deal an additional 19 damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5.0% and deal an additional 19 damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

1.name: Accumulating Flame
1.description: Quest: Every time a Hero is Ignited with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%. Reward: After Igniting 30 Heroes, gain 15 Armor for every enemy Hero ignited with Breath Of Fire. This lasts for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time a Hero is Ignited with Breath of Fire, increase its damage over time by 2%, up to 60%. Reward: After Igniting 30 Heroes, gain 15 Armor for every enemy Hero ignited with Breath Of Fire. This lasts for 3 seconds.

1.name: Freshest Ingredients
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chen's Health Regeneration by 1 per second. Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, 50% of the Shield from Fortifying Brew persists indefinitely after drinking.

1.name: Elusive Brawler
1.description: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

4.name: Deadly Strike
4.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.
4.longDescription: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

4.name: Keg Toss
4.description: Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 80.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.
4.longDescription: Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by 4, up to 80.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

4.name: Ring of Fire
4.description: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 54 damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing 54 damage every second to nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
7.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 19 Health per second.
7.longDescription: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 19 Health per second.

7.name: Bolder Flavor
7.description: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for 331. Additionally, Shields persist for 1 extra second after he stops drinking.
7.longDescription: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for 331. Additionally, Shields persist for 1 extra second after he stops drinking.

7.name: Purifying Brew
7.description: The next Stun or Silence used against Chen has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 15 seconds. While channeling Fortifying Brew gain 30 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 30%.
7.longDescription: The next Stun or Silence used against Chen has its duration reduced by 75% and resets the cooldown of Fortifying Brew. Can only trigger once every 15 seconds. While channeling Fortifying Brew gain 30 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 30%.

10.name: Wandering Keg
10.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 61 damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 60% increased Movement Speed, dealing 61 damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
10.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 75% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique ability. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.Storm can grant the spirits Movement Speed. Earth can leap to an area and slow enemies. Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed.

13.name: Pressure Point
13.description: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35.00% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.
13.longDescription: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 35.00% for 1 second, or by 70% if they're soaked in Brew.

13.name: A Touch of Honey
13.description: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.
13.longDescription: Increase the slow from Keg Smash to 40%.

13.name: Withering Flames
13.description: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Spell Power by 25% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Setting an enemy Hero on fire reduces their Spell Power by 25% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Flying Leap
16.description: Increases Flying Kick's range by 15%.
16.longDescription: Increases Flying Kick's range by 15%.

16.name: Another Round
16.description: Increases the radius of Keg Smash by 50%. After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of the next Basic Ability used will be reduced by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increases the radius of Keg Smash by 50%. After hitting an enemy Hero with Keg Smash, the cooldown of the next Basic Ability used will be reduced by 3 seconds.

16.name: Enough to Share
16.description: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 56 per second.
16.longDescription: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 56 per second.

20.name: Untapped Potential
20.description: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 100% and grants 50 Armor, reducing damage taken by 50%.
20.longDescription: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by 100% and grants 50 Armor, reducing damage taken by 50%.

20.name: Elemental Conduit
20.description: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities.Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable. Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds. Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.
20.longDescription: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities.Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable. Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds. Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

20.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
20.description: Heal for 1.5% of Chen's maximum Health every time his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.
20.longDescription: Heal for 1.5% of Chen's maximum Health every time his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

1.name: Target Practice
1.description: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow. Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%. Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow. Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%. Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.

1.name: Simple Geometry
1.description: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress. Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress. Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.

1.name: Redemption
1.description: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks. Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks. Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.

4.name: Explosive Arrows
4.description: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 75% of its damage to enemies around its target.
4.longDescription: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 75% of its damage to enemies around its target.

4.name: Serrated Arrows
4.description: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
4.longDescription: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

4.name: Ignore All Distractions
4.description: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.

7.name: The Dragon Hungers
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%.

7.name: Never Outmatched
7.description: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 40 to 20. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 40 to 20. Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Sharpened Arrowheads
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.

10.name: Dragonstrike
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 73 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 150% damage.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 73 damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 150% damage.

10.name: Dragon's Arrow
10.description: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 135 damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 270 and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 406 and the Stun duration to 2.0 seconds.
10.longDescription: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 135 damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 270 and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 406 and the Stun duration to 2.0 seconds.

13.name: Fleet of Foot
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ninja Assassin
13.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.
13.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

13.name: Mounted Archery
13.description: Upon mounting, gain 20% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.
13.longDescription: Upon mounting, gain 20% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

16.name: Flawless Technique
16.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 25%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 25%.
16.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 25%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 25%.

16.name: Piercing Arrows
16.description: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.
16.longDescription: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.

16.name: Giant Slayer
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 1.50% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 1.50% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: The Dragon Awakens
20.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 5 seconds.

20.name: Play of the Game
20.description: While in flight or for up to 2.0 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 137 damage to each target hit by the impact.Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.
20.longDescription: While in flight or for up to 2.0 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 137 damage to each target hit by the impact.Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.

20.name: Bullseye
20.description: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.

20.name: Perfect Agility
20.description: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

1.name: Mounting Sand
1.description: Increase the damage of Echo's Sand Blast by 40%. Hitting 3 or more consecutive Sand Blasts without missing counts as hitting 3 Heroes.
1.longDescription: Increase the damage of Echo's Sand Blast by 40%. Hitting 3 or more consecutive Sand Blasts without missing counts as hitting 3 Heroes.

1.name: Deep Breathing
1.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 3, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 140 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 3, up to 60. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 140 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gather 15.0 Regeneration Globes. Reward: After gathering 15.0 Globes, Chromie gains 5.00% Spell Power and her Mana Regeneration is increased by 1.
1.longDescription: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gather 15.0 Regeneration Globes. Reward: After gathering 15.0 Globes, Chromie gains 5.00% Spell Power and her Mana Regeneration is increased by 1.

4.name: Draconic Barrage
4.description: Increase the damage from Bronze Talons by an additional 100%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast applies Bronze Talons to Chromie's next 2 Basic Attacks.
4.longDescription: Increase the damage from Bronze Talons by an additional 100%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast applies Bronze Talons to Chromie's next 2 Basic Attacks.

4.name: Enveloping Assault
4.description: Increase Dragon's Breath's radius by 25%.
4.longDescription: Increase Dragon's Breath's radius by 25%.

4.name: Timely Surprise
4.description: Increase Time Trap's cast range by 33%. Additionally, the cooldowns of Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath are reset when Time Trap is triggered.
4.longDescription: Increase Time Trap's cast range by 33%. Additionally, the cooldowns of Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath are reset when Time Trap is triggered.

7.name: Mobius Loop
7.description: If Dragon's Breath hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds and restore 50 Mana.
7.longDescription: If Dragon's Breath hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds and restore 50 Mana.

7.name: Dragon’s Eye
7.description: Dragon’s Breath deals 25% more damage to enemies in the center.
7.longDescription: Dragon’s Breath deals 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

7.name: Chrono Sickness
7.description: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also Slowed by 35.00% for 4.00 seconds.
7.longDescription: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also Slowed by 35.00% for 4.00 seconds.

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly Slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it Slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Place a sand vortex that greatly Slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it Slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

10.name: Temporal Loop
10.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.
10.longDescription: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

13.name: Bye Bye!
13.description: Reduce the cast time of Hearthstone by 75.00%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.
13.longDescription: Reduce the cast time of Hearthstone by 75.00%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

13.name: Here and There
13.description: Activate to swap Chromie's position with her Sand Blast Echo.
13.longDescription: Activate to swap Chromie's position with her Sand Blast Echo.

13.name: Time Out
13.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.
13.longDescription: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 70% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: If Sand Blast travels at least 70% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.description: Activate to increase Spell Power by 25% for 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Spell Power by 25% for 10 seconds.

20.name: Pocket of Time
20.description: Remove Slowing Sands Mana cost and increase the Slow from 60% to 80%.
20.longDescription: Remove Slowing Sands Mana cost and increase the Slow from 60% to 80%.

20.name: Stuck in a Loop
20.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first.
20.longDescription: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first.

20.name: Piercing Sands
20.description: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant Quest progress.
20.longDescription: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant Quest progress.

20.name: Andorhal Anomaly
20.description: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps.
20.longDescription: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps.

1.name: Psi-Infusion
1.description: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm. Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%. Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20.00%
1.longDescription: Quest: Gain 1 Mana for every non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm. Reward: After hitting 500 enemies, increase the size of Psionic Storm by 20%. Reward: After hitting 1000 enemies, increase the damage of Psionic Storm by 20.00%

1.name: Templar's Will
1.description: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%. Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.
1.longDescription: Quest: Attacking enemy Heroes restores 8 mana per second. Reward: After spending 30 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's damage is increased by 125%. Reward: After spending 60 seconds attacking Heroes, Distortion Beam's range is increased by an additional 1.

1.name: Khaydarin Resonance
1.description: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 20.00%. Reward: After collecting 30 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 40.00%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Regeneration Globes grant an additional 100% Mana.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 20.00%. Reward: After collecting 30 Regeneration Globes, Plasma Shield's value is increased by 40.00%.

4.name: Khala's Celerity
4.description: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Plasma Shield also grants 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

4.name: Khala's Embrace
4.description: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.
4.longDescription: Increase the Life Steal of Plasma Shield to 75%.

4.name: Khala's Light
4.description: Plasma Shield grants Heroes 15 Armor for 3.00 seconds upon breaking or expiring, causing them to take 15% less damage.
4.longDescription: Plasma Shield grants Heroes 15 Armor for 3.00 seconds upon breaking or expiring, causing them to take 15% less damage.

7.name: Psionic Projection
7.description: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.
7.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Plasma Shield and Psionic Storm by 40%.

7.name: Resonation
7.description: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.
7.longDescription: Distortion Beam slows enemies affected by Psionic Storm by 50%.

7.name: Mental Acuity
7.description: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3.00 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.
7.longDescription: Quest: Each Takedown earned lowers the cooldown of Oracle by 3.00 seconds, to a maximum of 15 seconds. Reward: Upon getting 5 Takedowns, the sight range of Oracle is increased by 50%.

10.name: Archon
10.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 164 damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 82 damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 11 seconds.Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.
10.longDescription: Tassadar transforms into an Archon and gains a Plasma Shield. His Basic Attacks deal 164 damage, slow the target by 30% for 1 second and splash for 82 damage to enemies within 2.5 range. Lasts for 11 seconds.Passive: Archon refreshes the cooldown of Dimensional Shift.

10.name: Force Wall
10.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2.00 seconds. Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.
10.longDescription: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2.00 seconds. Passive: Increases the slow amount of Distortion Beam to 30%.

13.name: Deep Shift
13.description: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.
13.longDescription: Dimensional Shift's duration and Movement Speed bonuses are increased by 50%.

13.name: Adun's Wisdom
13.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 50% faster.
13.longDescription: While Oracle is active, Basic Abilities cooldown 50% faster.

13.name: Nullification
13.description: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Activate to reduce the damage the target enemy Hero deals by 75% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Phase Disruption
16.description: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 25, causing them to take 25% more damage from Basic Attacks.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes being hit by Psionic Storm have their Physical Armor reduced by 25, causing them to take 25% more damage from Basic Attacks.

16.name: Psionic Echo
16.description: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2.00 seconds of casting the first. Enemies can only be affected by one Psionic Storm at a time.
16.longDescription: A second Psionic Storm can be cast within 2.00 seconds of casting the first. Enemies can only be affected by one Psionic Storm at a time.

16.name: Focused Beam
16.description: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: While Oracle is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Twilight Archon
20.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Force Barrier
20.description: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Force Wall's Range is increased by 100% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

20.name: Prismatic Link
20.description: Distortion Beam bounces to hit 2 additional targets for 40% damage.
20.longDescription: Distortion Beam bounces to hit 2 additional targets for 40% damage.

20.name: Shield Battery
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes an untalented Plasma Shield.
